name: ARCx
introduce:
ARCx is a decentralized reputation protocol that allow users to unlock benefits through their on-chain behaviour in the world of decentralised finance. ARCx achieve this through processing and scoring large amounts of data and then uploading it to a user's Passport (a non-transferrable NFT). After claiming a Passport, users are incentivised to improve their on-chain reputation through maximising their Scores across multiple “games” so they can be rewarded with various benefits.
ARCx serves web3 by offering a trust-less way for participants to build a reputation, and a mechanism for other protocols and platforms to identify, reward and further incentivise good reputation.
